alert.note: Alert for Amite (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 9:28AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Amite County through 1000 AM CST... At 928 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smithdale, or 9 miles north of Liberty, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Liberty and Smithdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for southern Mississippi.
